text: @piersmorgan @piersmorgan I can’t agree more. It’s making an absolutely mockery of the thousands who have died of Covid19 and those who are seriously ill and fighting for their lives. And while thy lie in mortuary’s and hospitals these absolute clowns are doing whatever they hell they like!
